lead_paragraph: To the Editor: The ''mysterious Dr. Luke Blackburn,'' referred to in ''New York Was Bioterrorism Target, in 1864,'' (Nov. 13) did apparently scheme to infect Northern cities with yellow fever germs in the Civil War.
abstract: Wade Hall letter on scheme to infect Northern cities with yellow fever germs during Civil War, and alleged role of Dr Luke Blackburn
snippet: To the Editor:    The ''mysterious Dr. Luke Blackburn,'' referred to in ''New York Was Bioterrorism Target, in 1864,'' (Nov. 13) did apparently scheme to infect Northern cities with yellow fever germs in the Civil War....
